Breakfast.name: Vegetable Omelette
steps: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté vegetables for 2–3 minutes.
Pour eggs over veggies, cook until set, fold and serve.

Breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Cherry Tomatoes
steps: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread on toast.
Top with sliced cherry tomatoes.
Season with salt and pepper.

Breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
steps: Scoop yogurt into a bowl.
Add berries on top.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

Breakfast.name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan and add spinach.
Pour in eggs and cook until set.
Sprinkle feta before folding omelette.

Breakfast.name: Chia Seed Pudding
steps: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, and maple syrup in a bowl.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Top with fresh fruit before serving.

Breakfast.name: Keto Bacon and Egg Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook bacon until slightly crispy and place in muffin tins.
Whisk eggs with salt and pepper, pour into tins.
Sprinkle cheese and bake for 15 minutes.

Breakfast.name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with salt and lemon juice.
Spread avocado mixture on toast, sprinkle chili flakes, and serve.

Breakfast.name: Banana Pancakes
steps: Mash banana in a bowl, whisk in eggs and cinnamon.
Stir in almond flour until smooth.
Cook small pancakes in butter until golden on both sides.

Breakfast.name: Egg Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Whisk eggs with salt and pepper, stir in vegetables.
Pour mixture into muffin tins and bake for 15–20 minutes.

Breakfast.name: Chia Pudding
steps: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, vanilla, and maple syrup in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Stir before serving and top with fruits.

Breakfast.name: Egg & Spinach Wrap
steps: Scramble eggs with spinach in a pan.
Place on tortilla, sprinkle cheese, and wrap.
Serve warm.

Breakfast.name: Protein Pancakes
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Cook pancakes in a non-stick pan until golden.
Serve with berries or syrup.

Breakfast.name: Tofu Scramble
steps: Crumble tofu into a pan.
Add turmeric, onions, and spinach.
Cook for 5–7 minutes until heated through.

Breakfast.name: Cottage Cheese Bowl
steps: Spoon cottage cheese into a bowl.
Top with pineapple and chia seeds.
Serve chilled.

Breakfast.name: Sweet Potato Hash
steps: Peel and dice sweet potato.
Sauté with peppers in olive oil until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

Breakfast.name: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
steps: Place quinoa in a bowl.
Top with berries and coconut flakes.
Drizzle maple syrup and serve.

Breakfast.name: Egg White Frittata
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Whisk egg whites with salt and pepper.
Bake with vegetables for 15–20 minutes.

Breakfast.name: Smoked Salmon Wrap
steps: Spread cream cheese on tortilla.
Add salmon and lettuce.
Roll up and serve.

Breakfast.name: Mushroom & Spinach Scramble
steps: Heat olive oil, sauté mushrooms for 3 minutes.
Add spinach until wilted.
Pour in eggs, scramble until cooked.

Breakfast.name: Overnight Oats
steps: Mix oats, almond milk, and chia seeds in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Top with berries before serving.

Lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper, grill until cooked.
Toss greens, tomatoes, and cucumber in a bowl.
Top with chicken, drizzle olive oil and lemon juice.

Lunch.name: Quinoa & Roasted Veggie Bowl
steps: Roast vegetables in olive oil, salt, and pepper until tender.
Place quinoa in a bowl and top with vegetables.
Serve warm.

Lunch.name: Turkey Wrap
steps: Spread hummus on tortilla.
Add turkey, lettuce, and cucumber.
Roll up and slice in half.

Lunch.name: Lentil Soup
steps: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add lentils and broth, bring to a boil.
Simmer until lentils are tender, season to taste.

Lunch.name: Shrimp & Avocado Salad
steps: Toss shrimp and avocado with greens.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season and serve.

Lunch.name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
steps: Season salmon and asparagus with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill until salmon is cooked through and asparagus is tender.
Serve with lemon slices.

Lunch.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
steps: Sauté tofu in sesame oil until golden.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Season with soy sauce and serve.

Lunch.name: Whole Wheat Pasta with Pesto
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Toss with pesto and cherry tomatoes.
Top with parmesan before serving.

Lunch.name: Chickpea Salad
steps: Combine chickpeas, cucumber, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season and toss well.

Lunch.name: Beef & Vegetable Skewers
steps: Thread beef and vegetables onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil and season.
Grill until beef is cooked to preference.

Lunch.name: Baked Sweet Potato with Black Beans
steps: Bake sweet potato until soft.
Top with black beans, corn, and salsa.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

Lunch.name: Grilled Veggie Panini
steps: Spread pesto on bread slices.
Layer vegetables and mozzarella.
Grill in a panini press until cheese melts.

Lunch.name: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl
steps: Grill chicken and slice.
Serve over rice with broccoli.
Drizzle with teriyaki sauce and sprinkle sesame seeds.

Lunch.name: Greek Salad with Grilled Halloumi
steps: Grill halloumi until golden.
Combine vegetables and olives in a bowl.
Top with halloumi, drizzle olive oil, and sprinkle oregano.

Lunch.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Cook turkey with onions and tomato sauce.
Stuff peppers, top with cheese, and bake until tender.

Lunch.name: Sushi Bowl
steps: Place rice in a bowl.
Arrange salmon, cucumber, and avocado on top.
Drizzle soy sauce and sprinkle sesame seeds.

Lunch.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
steps: Sauté zucchini noodles for 2 minutes.
Toss with pesto and cherry tomatoes.
Top with parmesan and serve.

Lunch.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add sliced chicken, dressing, and parmesan.
Top with croutons and serve.

Lunch.name: Falafel Wrap
steps: Warm tortilla and arrange lettuce and tomatoes.
Add falafel and drizzle tahini sauce.
Wrap and serve.

Lunch.name: Bulgur Wheat Tabbouleh
steps: Mix bulgur wheat with tomatoes and parsley.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.
Season with salt and serve.

Dinner.name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
steps: Season salmon with salt and pepper
Grill salmon and asparagus brushed with olive oil for 4–5 minutes per side
Serve with lemon wedges

Dinner.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Slice chicken thinly and season lightly
Stir-fry chicken in sesame oil for 3–4 minutes
Add vegetables, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger; cook until tender

Dinner.name: Vegetable Lentil Soup
steps: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes.
Add lentils, broth, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 25–30 minutes until lentils are tender.

Dinner.name: Beef & Broccoli
steps: Heat oil and sear beef for 3 minutes.
Add broccoli, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and garlic.
Stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender.

Dinner.name: Quinoa Stuffed Peppers
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Mix quinoa, beans, corn, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper.
Stuff peppers and bake at 180°C for 20–25 minutes.

Dinner.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
steps: Spiralize zucchinis into noodles.
Sauté lightly, add pesto, and toss to coat.
Top with cherry tomatoes and parmesan.

Dinner.name: Baked Cod with Vegetables
steps: Place cod and vegetables on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Bake at 180°C for 15–20 minutes.

Dinner.name: Turkey Meatballs with Tomato Sauce
steps: Mix turkey, egg, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper into meatballs.
Brown meatballs in a pan.
Simmer in tomato sauce for 15 minutes.

Dinner.name: Shrimp & Vegetable Skewers
steps: Thread shrimp and vegetables onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Grill for 3–4 minutes per side.

Dinner.name: Chickpea & Spinach Curry
steps: Sauté garlic in a pan.
Add curry paste, coconut milk, and chickpeas.
Simmer for 10 minutes, stir in spinach until wilted.

Dinner.name: Baked Chicken Parmesan
steps: Coat chicken with breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.
Top with marinara and mozzarella; bake until cheese melts.

Dinner.name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
steps: Cut zucchinis in half and scoop out centers.
Cook turkey with garlic, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper.
Fill zucchini halves, top with cheese, and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.

Dinner.name: Grilled Tuna Steak
steps: Season tuna with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Brush with olive oil and grill for 2–3 minutes per side.
Serve immediately.

Dinner.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Heat sesame oil, sauté garlic and vegetables.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Serve hot.

Dinner.name: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice eggplant, brush with oil, and coat with breadcrumbs.
Bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.
Top with marinara and cheese; bake until melted.

Dinner.name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
steps: Cook chicken in a pan until golden.
Add teriyaki sauce and simmer for 3 minutes.
Serve over rice with broccoli.

Dinner.name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté vegetables with garlic and olive oil.
Toss pasta with vegetables, herbs, salt, and pepper.

Dinner.name: Salmon & Quinoa Salad
steps: Grill salmon until cooked.
Mix quinoa with spinach and vinaigrette.
Top with salmon and serve.

Dinner.name: Turkey Chili
steps: Cook turkey and onions until browned.
Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.

Dinner.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter, add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss pasta with shrimp, parsley, salt, and pepper.

Smoothies.name: Mango Banana Smoothie
steps: Peel and chop mango and banana
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve chilled

Smoothies.name: Strawberry Oat Smoothie
steps: Wash and hull strawberries
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until creamy
Pour into a glass and enjoy

Smoothies.name: Avocado Spinach Smoothie
steps: Scoop avocado flesh
Add spinach, coconut milk, and flaxseeds to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve immediately

Smoothies.name: Blueberry Almond Smoothie
steps: Wash blueberries
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Pour into glass and enjoy

Smoothies.name: Pineapple Coconut Smoothie
steps: Add pineapple, coconut milk, and chia seeds to blender
Blend until creamy
Serve with ice cubes

Smoothies.name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
steps: Peel banana
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve immediately

Smoothies.name: Cucumber Mint Smoothie
steps: Peel and chop cucumber
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve chilled

Smoothies.name: Raspberry Chia Smoothie
steps: Wash raspberries
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve chilled

Smoothies.name: Chocolate Protein Smoothie
steps: Peel banana
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until creamy
Serve immediately

Smoothies.name: Green Detox Smoothie
steps: Wash kale
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth
Serve chilled

Smoothies.name: Papaya Banana Smoothie
steps: Add papaya, banana, and almond milk to blender.
Blend until smooth and serve chilled.

Smoothies.name: Spinach Apple Smoothie
steps: Combine spinach, apple, and coconut water in blender.
Blend until smooth and drink fresh.

Smoothies.name: Tropical Sunrise Smoothie
steps: Add pineapple, mango, banana, and orange juice to blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve cold with ice.

Smoothies.name: Berry Spinach Smoothie
steps: Add spinach, berries, almond milk, and yogurt to blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve cold.

Smoothies.name: Banana Almond Protein Smoothie
steps: Place banana, protein powder, almond butter, and almond milk in blender.
Blend until creamy.

Smoothies.name: Kiwi Pineapple Smoothie
steps: Blend kiwi, pineapple, and coconut water until smooth.
Serve cold.

Smoothies.name: Berry Chia Smoothie
steps: Add berries, chia seeds, protein powder, and almond milk to blender.
Blend until smooth.

Smoothies.name: Coconut Matcha Smoothie
steps: Blend matcha powder, coconut milk, and avocado until creamy.
Serve immediately.

Smoothies.name: Tropical Green Smoothie
steps: Blend kale, mango, pineapple, and coconut water until smooth.
Serve chilled.

Smoothies.name: Raspberry Yogurt Smoothie
steps: Combine raspberries, yogurt, and almond milk in blender.
Blend until smooth.

Snacks.name: Roasted Chickpeas
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Toss chickpeas with olive oil, paprika, and salt.
Roast for 25–30 minutes until crispy.

Snacks.name: Almond Butter Energy Balls
steps: Mix oats, almond butter, honey, and protein powder.
Form into bite-sized balls.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.

Snacks.name: Guacamole with Veggie Sticks
steps: Mash avocado with lime juice and salt.
Serve with carrot, cucumber, and bell pepper sticks.

Snacks.name: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple
steps: Place cottage cheese in a bowl.
Top with pineapple chunks and serve.

Snacks.name: Keto Cheese Crisps
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Spoon small mounds of cheese onto a lined baking sheet.
Bake for 5–7 minutes until golden and crispy.

Snacks.name: Trail Mix
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Store in an airtight container.

Snacks.name: Egg Salad Lettuce Wraps
steps: Mash boiled eggs with mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Scoop onto lettuce leaves and roll up.

Snacks.name: Peanut Butter Apple Slices
steps: Slice apple into wedges.
Spread peanut butter on each slice.

Snacks.name: Smoked Salmon Cucumber Bites
steps: Slice cucumber into rounds.
Top with cream cheese and smoked salmon.

Snacks.name: Edamame with Sea Salt
steps: Boil edamame in salted water for 5 minutes.
Drain and sprinkle with sea salt.

Snacks.name: Protein Bar
steps: Unwrap protein bar.
Serve as is or cut into smaller pieces.

Snacks.name: Roasted Almonds
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Toss almonds with olive oil and salt.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 10–12 minutes.
Cool before serving.

Snacks.name: Stuffed Celery Sticks
steps: Spread cream cheese into celery sticks.
Sprinkle with chopped chives before serving.

Snacks.name: Baked Zucchini Chips
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Slice zucchini thinly and toss with olive oil and salt.
Bake for 20 minutes until crispy.

Snacks.name: Hummus with Carrot Sticks
steps: Place hummus in a small bowl.
Serve with carrot sticks for dipping.

Snacks.name: Turkey Roll-Ups
steps: Spread cream cheese over turkey slices.
Place cucumber strips inside and roll up.

Snacks.name: Almond Date Bites
steps: Slice dates open and remove pits.
Insert two almonds into each date.

Snacks.name: Cucumber Slices with Hummus
steps: Wash and slice cucumber.
Arrange slices on a plate.
Serve with hummus for dipping.

Snacks.name: Celery Sticks with Peanut Butter
steps: Wash and cut celery sticks.
Fill grooves with peanut butter.
Serve chilled.

Snacks.name: Mixed Berries
steps: Wash berries thoroughly.
Serve fresh in a bowl.
